data.title: TTS – Tech Stories Rocking Africa: Celebrating Nigerian Philip Emeagwali
data.meta_description: Nigerian-born computer scientist, Philip Emeagwali, known for his use of a Connection Machine supercomputer was born on 24th of August, 2023 and we celebrate him today. Tech Word - IPO (Initial Public Offering): An IPO is when a privately owned company lists its shares on a stock exchange, making it available for the general public
data.meta_site_name: Africa Tech Radio - Africa’s Number One Technology Radio
data.text:
Nigerian-born computer scientist, Philip Emeagwali, known for his use of a Connection Machine supercomputer was born on 24th of August, 2023 and we celebrate him today.

Tech Word – IPO (Initial Public Offering): An IPO is when a privately owned company lists its shares on a stock exchange, making it available for the general public to buy shares of the company.

South Africa bans Starlink kit importation and use by ISP

Ghana and Zambia begin biometric voter registration in September

Tanzanians experience power cuts because of system error

Nigeria’s Flutterwave still plans to IPO

South Africa bans Starlink kit importation and use by ISP

YouTube records over 1.7 billion views for AI-tools related videos in 2023

Google Startup Accelerator opens for AI startups in Africa.

Catch up on the latest Tech News on #TonysTechSide.
